Class CoopSecondPlayerView

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.cooperateBattle.coopGUI.CoopSecondPlayerView
public class CoopSecondPlayerView extends Object
Encapsulates the second player's brick and ghost panels and provides build/refresh methods formerly present in the controller.

  • Constructor Details

    • CoopSecondPlayerView

      public CoopSecondPlayerView(javafx.scene.layout.Pane secondBrickPanel, javafx.scene.layout.Pane secondGhostPanel)

  • Method Details

    • build

      public void build(ViewData rightView, double cellW, double cellH, double hgap, double vgap)
      Build the visual rectangles for the given preview/brick shape. hgap and vgap are added to the provided cell dimensions to match layout spacing.

    • refresh

      public void refresh(ViewData v, int[][] boardMatrix, BoardView boardView, ViewData currentViewData, double cellW, double cellH, double baseOffsetX, double baseOffsetY)
      Refresh the second player's view. All external state required is passed in. - v: the ViewData for the second player - boardMatrix: the current board matrix - boardView: optional BoardView to compute scene coordinates (can be null) - currentViewData: the current primary view data (used when computing ghost intersection) - cellW/cellH: single-cell dimensions in pixels - baseOffsetX/baseOffsetY: fallback base offset used when scene coordinates are not available

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Set visibility of the second player panels.

    • getSecondBrickPanel

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getSecondBrickPanel()

    • getSecondGhostPanel
